Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

11  KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent::KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent() :
12  fForceConversion( false ),
13  fDoConversion( true ),
14  fDoAuger( true ),
15  fMyRelaxation( NULL ),
16  fMyConversion( NULL )
17  {
18  }

20  KSComponent(),

35 
36  void KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent::Dice( KSParticleQueue* aPrimaries )
37  {
38 
39  KSParticle* tParticle;
40  KSParticleQueue tParticles;
41  KSParticleIt tParticleIt;
42 
43 
44  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
45  {
46 
47 
48  //***********
49  //conversions
50  //***********
51 
52  vector< double > conversionElectronEnergy;
53  vector< int > conversionVacancy;
54 
55  if( fDoConversion == true )
56  {
57  genmsg_debug( "creating a conversion electron" << fMyConversion << eom );
58 
59  fMyConversion->SetForceCreation( fForceConversion );
60  while( conversionVacancy.size() == 0 )
61  {
62  fMyConversion->CreateCE( conversionVacancy, conversionElectronEnergy );
63  }
64 
65  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < conversionElectronEnergy.size(); i++ )
66  {
67  genmsg_debug( "vacancy at: " << conversionVacancy.at(i) << ret );
68  genmsg_debug( "electron energy: " << conversionElectronEnergy.at(i) << eom );
69  fMyRelaxation->GetVacancies()->push_back( conversionVacancy.at( i ) );
70 
71  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
72  tParticle->SetLabel( "krypton_conversion" );
73  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( conversionElectronEnergy.at( i ) );
74  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
75  }
76  }
77  else
78  {
79  genmsg_debug( "conversion electron generation not activated" << eom );
80  }
81 
82  //******
83  //augers
84  //******
85 
86  if( fDoAuger == true )
87  {
88  if( conversionElectronEnergy.size() != 0 )
89  {
90  fMyRelaxation->ClearAugerEnergies();
91  fMyRelaxation->Relax();
92 
93  for( unsigned int i = 0; i < fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().size(); i++ )
94  {
95  genmsg_debug( "auger energy: " << fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().at(i) << eom );
96  tParticle = new KSParticle( **tParticleIt );
97  tParticle->SetKineticEnergy_eV( fMyRelaxation->GetAugerEnergies().at( i ) );
98  tParticle->SetLabel( "krypton_auger" );
99  tParticles.push_back( tParticle );
100  }
101  }
102  else
103  {
104  genmsg_debug( "no vacancy, therefore no auger electron can be produced" << eom );
105  }
106  }
107  else
108  {
109  genmsg_debug( "auger electron production not activated" << eom );
110  }
111 
112  }
113 
114  for( tParticleIt = aPrimaries->begin(); tParticleIt != aPrimaries->end(); tParticleIt++ )
115  {
116  tParticle = *tParticleIt;
117  delete tParticle;
118  }
119 
120  aPrimaries->assign( tParticles.begin(), tParticles.end() );
121 
122  return;
123  }
124 
125  void KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent::SetForceConversion( bool aSetting )
126  {
127  fForceConversion = aSetting;
128  }

130  {
131  fDoConversion = aSetting;
132  }
133  void KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent::SetDoAuger( bool aSetting )
134  {
135  fDoAuger = aSetting;
136  }
137 
138  void KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent::InitializeComponent()
139  {
140  genmsg_debug( "reading conversion and relaxation data for krypton..." << eom );
141 
142  fMyConversion = new KSGenConversion();
143  fMyConversion->Initialize( 83 );
144 
145  fMyRelaxation = new KSGenRelaxation();
146  fMyRelaxation->Initialize( 83 );
147 
148  genmsg_debug( "...all data read, instances of conversion and relaxation class created" << eom );
149 
150  return;
151  }
152  void KSGenEnergyKryptonEvent::DeinitializeComponent()
153  {
154  delete fMyConversion;
155  delete fMyRelaxation;
156  return;
157  }
158 
159 }
